Radio sensors and control units

Build a system that meets your needs
Livi Smart Hub
Livi Smart Hub is an essential element of the Livicom Smart Home. It combines Livi radio devices in a unified system, receives information from the sensors, and sends notifications to user's smartphones. Livi Smart Hub has a built-in diagnostics of communication channels state, power supply state, and the finance balance of the SIM-card.

 Supports Ethernet, 2G, and 3G cellular standards
Connects with up to 256 Livi radio devices
Power supply: adaptor 5 V, 1 A
Power backup: Li-Ion battery 1000 mAh
Power backup time: 12 hours
Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi Smart Hub 2G
Livi Smart Hub 2G is an essential element of the Livicom Smart Home. It combines Livi radio devices in a unified system, receives information from the sensors, and sends notifications to user's smartphones. Livi Smart Hub 2G has a built-in diagnostics of communication channels state, power supply state, and the finance balance of the SIM-card.

 Supports Ethernet and 2G cellular standard
Connects with up to 64 Livi radio devices
Power supply: adaptor 5 V, 1 A
Power backup: Li-Ion battery 1000 mAh
Power backup time: 15 hours

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi MS motion sensor
A wireless passive infrared sensor detects intrusions into a guarded site. Сustomizable sensitivity to pets weighing up to 20 kg. Protected against false alarms caused by bright light and heatwaves. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Motion detection: up to 10 m
The angle of motion detection: up to 88,5 degrees
Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C
Power supply: battery type CR123A
Battery life: 10 years

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi MSW
curtain motion sensor
A wireless passive infrared curtain-type sensor forms a virtual wall and detects intrusions through doors and windows into a guarded site. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications..

Motion detection: up to 12 m Motion detection bandwidth: up to 2,2 m Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Power supply: battery type CR123А Battery life: 10 years

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi FS smoke sensor
A wireless smoke sensor uses the scattered light method and helps to detect a fire early. The sensor has a preliminary smoker warning mode. The self-testing system of the dust level will notify the user when the sensor needs to be cleaned. Protected against false alarms caused by bright light or insects. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.For detailed information: fire detection systems (Turkish).

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Main power supply: battery type CR123A Backup power supply: battery type CR2032 Battery life: 10 years

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi CS opening sensor
A wireless opening sensor detects an intrusion into a guarded site. The sensor controls the opening and closing of doors, windows, shutters, hatches or gates. Livi CS consists of a magnetically operated switch and a magnet. An external wired reed switch can be connected to the sensor. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.


Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi GS glass break sensor
A wireless acoustic glass break sensor detects the shattering of glass and glass structures. An electret microphone is used to capture the sound of glass breaking into a guarded site. An external wired reed switch can be connected to the sensor. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C
Power supply: battery type CR123A
Battery life: 10 years
Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi VS impact sensor
A wireless impact sensor with a high-precision accelerometer determines the displacement or impact on the guarded surface. The sensor can detect the signs of cutting, drilling, or breaking glass, metal, brick, and reinforced concrete structures. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C
Power supply: battery type CR123A
Battery life: 10 years
Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi RFID security control panel
Wireless security control panel identifies users reading ISO 15693 and ISO 14443А RFID-tags. The panel allows users to arm and disarm the security alarm without using the Livicom mobile app. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Power supply: battery type CR123A Battery life: 10 years

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi Key Fob control panel
A wireless portable control panel can arm and disarm the security alarm system, launch scripts, and send an alarm alert. The panel is designed as a key fob and has four programmable buttons..

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Power supply: battery type CR2032 Battery life: over 10 years

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi Socket
A wireless smart socket can remotely control electrical appliances with powers of up to 3.5 kW. It turns on/off the power supply, measures instant voltage and power consumption. The device can be used as a thermostat to control electric heaters. Build-in temperature and over-voltage protection. Connection loss notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C
Handled power: up to 3.5 kW
Socket standard: EU VDE

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi Relay 12/24
«dry contact» relay
Wireless dry contact relay remotely controls electrical appliances, gate drives, door locks with powers of up to 3.5 kW. Livi Relay 12/24 has a thermostat mode and pulse control mode with a customizable pulse duration.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Supply voltage: 10 – 30 V DC
Resistive load: 16 A / 250 V AC, 10 A / 30 V DC
Inductive capacitive load: 8 A / 250 V AC, 10 A / 30 V DC
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C
Livi Relay
Wireless power relay with 1 relay output remotely controls electrical appliances with powers of up to 3.5 kW.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Supply voltage: 10 – 30 V DC Switched current: up to 16 A Handled power: up to 3.5 kW
Livi Light Control unit
A wireless light control unit controls lighting via the Livicom mobile app and light switches. The device has two dry contact inputs for light switches and two control outputs. Two control outputs can be connected to two separate lighting lines or one SPDT switch (for turning a light on or off from two locations). Only incandescent and LED lamps of 10 watts or more can be used.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C

Livi Roller Shutter unit
Livi Roller Shutter unit controls three-phase electric drives of roller shutters, curtains, blinds, or gates via the Livicom mobile app and switches. The device has 2 inputs for roller control switches and 2 relay outputs for the motion direction (upwards/downwards).

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °
Maximum load current: 1.7 A (cosϕ ≠ 1)

Livi Water Control unit
Wireless water leakage protection unit cuts off the water when leakage is detected with the help of additional ball valves with electrical drives. Two wired leak sensors can be placed in separate areas of potential flooding. Livi Water Control can collect data from the pulse outputs of two household water meters. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications..

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from 0 to +55 °C
Power supply: 2 batteries type CR123A
Optional power supply: 220 V through a power adapter 5 V, 1 A
Battery life: over 10 years
Livi LS water leak sensor
A wireless water leak sensor has 2 external wired leak sensors for 2 separate areas of potential flooding. External leak sensors are protected against false alarms caused by splashes and wet cleaning. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications..

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from 0 to +55 °C
Power supply: battery type CR123A
Battery life: 10 years
Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi TS temperature sensor
Wireless temperature sensor measures temperature at the installation location. Measurement can be done not only by the built-in temperature sensor but also by 2 additional external DS18B20 wired temperature sensors connected to Livi TS. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz
Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub
Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C
Power supply: battery type CR123A
Battery life: over 10 years
Measuring range of the built-in sensor: from -20 to +55 °C
Measuring range of external sensors: from -45 to +85 °С


Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi RC
resource consumption sensor
Wireless resource consumption sensor can measure the consumption of electricity, hot and cold water. The device counts pulses generated at the output of the meter and can collect data from two water meters or one electricity meter. Automatically transfers data every 2 minutes. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications..

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Power supply: battery type CR123A Battery life: over 10 years
Livi US universal sensor
A wireless universal sensor integrates third-party wired dry contact type security, fire, emergency or technological sensors into the Livicom system. One device can be connected to 2 outdoor security sensors, gas leakage sensors, threshold pressure sensors, level sensors, etc. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHz Operating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart Hub Operating temperature: from -20 to +55 °C Power supply: battery type CR123A Battery life: over 10 year
Livi Siren
A wireless siren is designed for sound notification in case of emergency (robbery, fire, accident). The external LED indicator of the security alarm state can be connected. Customizable duration and loudness of the sound notification. Sound confirmation of enabling and disabling the guard. Battery discharge, connection loss, device tampering notifications.

Operating frequency: 868.7 MHzOperating range: up to 1 km from Livi Smart HubOperating temperature: from -20 to +55 °CAcoustic power: up to 105 dB at a distance of 1 mMain power supply: 2 batteries type CR123ABattery life: over 10 years

Kullanım Kılavuzunu İndir
Livi Tag RFID-tag
RFID tag is used with security control panel Livi RFID. The tag supports standard 14443А.
